Desc.entry: Community-based circus school running workshops, evening classes and courses. Also runs an outreach circus skills programme and hires space to performance groups and for exhibitions etc. Licensed for public performance and entertainment until 11pm. Has a stage, PA system and full lighting and sound facilities. Prioritises circus and performance related activities. Has a custom-installed trapeze rig and offers the full range of circus skills to learn, including: static and swinging trapeze, cordelise, silks, chinese pole, tightwire, stilts, unicycles and various juggling equipment.
